Anthony Braxton.title: Quartet (Bristol) 1985
Anthony Braxton.about:
**THIS CONCERT IS ALSO INCLUDED IN THE QUARTET (ENGLAND) 1985 SET**



Recorded at Arnolfini, Bristol, November 21, 1985



All recordings previously unreleased



PDF liner notes, including previously unreleased photos, included with download



Original recordings by Graham Lock

Audio restoration by Chris Trent

Photos by Nick White

Cover art by I.A. Freeman
Anthony Braxton.credits:
released June 4, 2025
            
            Anthony Braxton - reeds

Marilyn Crispell - piano

Mark Dresser - double bass

Gerry Hemingway - percussion

Anthony Braxton.title: Quartet (England) 1985
Anthony Braxton.about:
Tracks 1-2 recorded at the Leadmill, Sheffield, November 19, 1985

Tracks 3-4 recorded at the Great Hall, Leicester Polytechnic, Leicester, November 20, 1985

Tracks 5-6 recorded at Arnolfini, Bristol, November 21, 1985

Tracks 7-8 recorded at Solent Suite, Guildhall, Southampton, November 22, 1985

Track 9 recorded at soundcheck, Strathallan Hotel, Birmingham, November 17, 1985

Track 10 recorded at soundcheck, Strathallan Hotel, Birmingham, November 17, 1985

Track 11 recorded at soundcheck, Arnolfini, Bristol, November 21, 1985

Track 12 recorded at soundcheck, St. Paul's Hall, Huddersfield, November 25, 1985

Track 13 recorded at soundcheck, Arts Centre Studio, Warwick University, Coventry, November 26, 1985



All recordings previously unreleased

Tracks 9-13 are exclusive to this set and not available separately



PDF liner notes, including previously unreleased photos, included with download



Original recordings by Graham Lock

Audio restoration by Chris Trent

Photos by Nick White

Cover art by I.A. Freeman

released June 4, 2025
            
            Anthony Braxton - reeds

Marilyn Crispell - piano

Mark Dresser - double bass

Gerry Hemingway - percussion
